name: Jeremy, The Patronizing Saint of DevOps 🇺🇲🇺🇦

content.html: In case you were ever wonder what _NOT_ to do at a conference, here’s a really good write up by @nialljoemaher “10 Tips on Running a Terrible conference  - Lessons from #ModernFrontends” youtu.be/Ekn-qiH8Ozw
